detail_desc: T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Poncho in a soft, fine-knit wool and cashmere blend with a draped collar and ribbed trim at one side.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Tailored trousers woven in a stretch cotton blend with a concealed zip in the side and fake back pocket. Straight tapered legs with creases and short slits at the hems.
Top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves and decorative buttons down the front.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves in woven fabric with broderie anglaise and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Ribbing around the neckline.
KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Fully lined swimsuit with an all-over print, flounced trim at the top and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.

Knee-length coat in woven fabric with notch lapels, a detachable belt with a round metal buckle at the waist and no fasteners. Adjustable tab and press-studs at the cuffs and discreet pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Laptop bag in grained imitation leather with a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap, two handles and a zip at the top. One zipped inner compartment and one laptop sleeve. Lined. Size 5.5x28x38 cm.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.

Long, cold shoulder jumpsuit in cotton seersucker with elastication and a wide, pompom-trimmed flounce at the top that continues over the arms. Narrow shoulder straps, an elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist and diagonal side pockets.
Necklace with five metal chains in various designs, one with a round pendant. Adjustable length 37-44 cm.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit containing some alpaca wool with an all-over print.

Short cotton flannel shirt with a drawstring hood lined in sweatshirt fabric. Press-studs down the front, a drawstring at the hem and flap chest pockets with a concealed press-stud. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs.
Calf-length dress in textured-knit jersey with a slight sheen. Boat neck at the front, a V-neck at the back with narrow crossover straps, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, washed denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and legs with seams and narrow hems.
Lined swimsuit with a matching hairband. Swimsuit with a flounced trim around the neckline and flounce-trimmed shoulder straps. Hairband with a knot at the front and covered elastication at the back.
Bikers in stretch fabric with a high waist and lined gusset. Firm shaping effect on the tummy, bum and thighs.

Baby Exclusive. Trousers in double-weave, crinkled organic cotton with an elasticated waist, decorative buttons at the front, side pockets, a back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Detachable elastic braces with imitation leather details.
Sandals with narrow straps at the front and a heel strap. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with embroidery on the front and one sleeve, and ribbing around the neckline cuffs and hem.

Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow shoulder strap and one inner compartment. Flap with a concealed magnetic fastener and decorative tab with a metal fastener. Lined. Size 6x17.5x20 cm.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with an elasticated waist, fly with a button, pleats at the front, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.

Calf-length dress in a patterned weave with an opening at the front and ties at the top. Short, elasticated sleeves, flounces at the front, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Sleeveless dress in lace with flounces at the top that continue over the shoulders and an opening and button at the back of the neck. Lined.
Top in sturdy jersey with long sleeves and embroidery at the cuffs.
Scarf in woven fabric with fringes on the short sides.
Calf-length, off-the-shoulder jersey dress in a viscose blend containing glittery threads, with elastication at the top, long sleeves, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Shorts in soft, cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué on the front.
Joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and elasticated hems. Slim Fit.

Nursing dress in Tencel™ lyocell denim with a wrapover front, collar and V-neck with a concealed press-stud. Practical inner top for easier nursing access. Long sleeves with a tab and button, a narrow elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Lace bralette in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps and lacing at the back. Narrow elasticated seam under the bust.
Suede Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 2.5 cm.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in a woven cotton blend with a ribbed collar and zip down the front. Straight cut with welt side pockets and long raglan sleeves with inner ribbing at the cuffs. Rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Lining and padding in recycled polyester.
Thin metal chain necklaces with pendants in various designs. Adjustable length, 42-49.5 cm, 55-62.5 cm and 65-72.5 cm..
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a small appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the sweatshirt is organic.

Dress in a patterned viscose weave with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and yoke at the front with a flounced trim that continues over the shoulders. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a seam at the waist and hem to create width in the skirt. Unlined.
Football shirt in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif front and back. Short raglan sleeves ending in a double layer in a contrasting colour.
Top in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in soft cotton chambray with an elasticated waist, side pockets with a decorative scalloped trim, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Soft nursing bras in organic cotton jersey with lightly padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Slightly wider, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
V-neck T-shirt in cotton jersey with raw edges.
Metal bracelets in different designs decorated with acrylic beads, alabaster stones and shells.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim, side pockets and tapered legs.
Sleeveless dress in cotton jersey with a V-neck, double-layered top and flounced,trimmed shoulder straps with broderie anglaise. Elasticated seam at the waist and ties at the back.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Double-layered jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with woven details, a collar with a sewn-on bow tie, and button placket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and press-studs at the crotch.
Fine-knit sports socks in a soft cotton blend.
Wide trousers in sturdy jersey with concealed elastication at the waist and straight legs.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit containing glittery threads with an embroidered motif on the turned-up hem and a faux fur pompom.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Top with a small bow at the neckline and short, flounced sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated waist and gathered frills at the hems.
Calf-length jeans in washed denim with elastication and a detachable belt at the waist. Side pockets at the front, a welt back pocket and straight, wide legs.
Fully lined striped tankini top and bottoms. Top with frill-trimmed shoulder straps and a frill at the hem. Bottoms with frills at the back.
High-waisted, knee-length shorts in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details and a zip fly with a button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge hems.
Short cardigan knitted in fluffy yarn with long sleeves and no buttons.

V-neck blouse woven in a crinkled cupro blend with a collar, wrapover top with a draped effect, long sleeves and wide cuffs with a slit and button. Seam with concealed elastication at the waist, a decorative knot detail at one side, and a lower section with an asymmetric cut at the front of the hem.
5-pocket dress in stretch cotton twill with adjustable straps with metal fasteners, press-studs at the top, a zip fly and raw-edge hem.
Espadrilles in cotton with a braided jute trim around the soles and concealed elastic at the back of the heels. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Hard plastic smartphone case with a selfie light in two places. Built-in battery. USB 2.0 charging cable included. Fits iPhone 6/7. The cable is only for charging and synchronisation via a computer.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, press-studs at the top and short sleeves.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Padded gilet in woven fabric with an imitation leather yoke. Detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and front pockets with a press-stud. Lined.
Pull-on trousers in an airy viscose weave with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Relaxed fit with side pockets and tapered legs.
Short, A-line skirt in imitation leather with a zip and buttons at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in soft, organic cotton waffle jersey with covered elastication at the waist, a fake fly with decorative buttons, diagonal side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Boxy polo-neck jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.

Short V-neck dress in airy chiffon with short, flounced sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and an asymmetric skirt with billowing flounces. Lined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neckline and gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Sleeveless dresses in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Long-sleeved top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck.
All-in-one suit in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front and front pockets. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a square neckline and long puff sleeves.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a text print and reversible sequin motif on the front.
Round sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
